docs.title: mdm2df(fpath)
docs.text:
Converts MDM formatted data to a pandas DataFrame.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default fpath str

The file path of the MDM file to be parsed.

required

Returns:

Type Description

pandas.DataFrame: A DataFrame containing the structured data from the MDM file.

docs.title: plot_selected_data(data_dict, selected_keys, x_axis, y_axis, legend=None, Abs=False, xscal=1, yscal=1)
docs.text: selected_keys needs to be [list] x_axis, y_axis is DataFrame column name

docs.title: read_mdm_multiple(filename, var)
docs.text: Read .mdm file that may contain multiple sections with different Vgate values. Each section starts with 'BEGIN_DB' and ends with 'END_DB'. The function returns a dictionary with keys as Vgate values and values as DataFrames.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
To install this library, run:

```bash pip install my-library
